Reviews.Title: samsung wave y

Reviews.Content: I really love my new phone it is awesome. was everything i expected and then some. i higly recommend that you buy it

Reviews.Title: Bada platform not compatible with T-Moblie
Reviews.Author: KRISTEN
Reviews.Content: I dropped my HTC phone and shattered the screen, so I came to Amazon to see if I could find an inexpensive replacement phone. This is a cute little phone, but it is not an Android phone. It comes with Bada, which is not compatible with most of my T-Mobile services. I could make and receive texts and phone calls, but I could not access the internet or GPS. There are no apps for facebook or email. I returned the phone and got a Samsung Galaxy Y instead, which works great.
